metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14586 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-624. A SEGV can occur in AP4_Mpeg2TsAudioSampleStream::WriteSample in Core/Ap4Mpeg2Ts.cpp, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-14532.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
